mapper.select: SELECT P.PAY_SN, P.PAY_AMOUNT, P.PAY_DT, P.PAY_MTH, L.RQEST_YM FROM LEVY L JOIN PAY P ON L.PAY_SN = P.PAY_SN WHERE L.HSHLD_ID = #{hshldId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY ( PAY_SN, PAY_AMOUNT, PAY_DT, PAY_MTH ) VALUES ( #{paySn}, #{payAmount}, SYSDATE, #{payMth} )
mapper.select: SELECT RQEST_SN, PAY_TMLMT, RQEST_YM, RQEST_DT, MANAGECT_TOT_AMOUNT, HSHLD_ID, PAY_SN, PAY_STTUS FROM LEVY WHERE HSHLD_ID = #{hshldId} AND PAY_STTUS = 1
